chapters.summary: A new study suggests there are about 73,000 kinds of trees, many of them still undiscovered. South America has 43% of the planet's tree species and the largest number of rare species at about 8200. Study can contribute to tree and forest conservation efforts.
chapters.gist: New Study Finds 73,000 Trees on Earth
chapters.headline: New study estimates Earth has about 73,300 tree species, 14% higher
